LanguageData.VMF_AllowsHaulInDesc: Allows colonists to haul in storage on this vehicle's map.
LanguageData.VMF_AllowsHaulOutDesc: Allows colonists to haul out storage on this vehicle's map.
LanguageData.VMF_IncreasePriorityDesc: Increase all storage priorities on this vehicle's map
LanguageData.VMF_DecreasePriorityDesc: Decrease all storage priorities on this vehicle's map
LanguageData.VMF_AutoGetOffDesc: Colonists who have nothing to do on the vehicle map will automatically get off this vehicle's map.
LanguageData.VMF_LowerPowerDesc: Lower the target power transmission amount.
LanguageData.VMF_ResetPowerDesc: Reset the target power transmission amount.
LanguageData.VMF_RaisePowerDesc: Raise the target power transmission amount.
LanguageData.VMF_ReassignDesc: Reassign the turret that this seat operates.
